name: Qr Code Master
description:
Qr Code Master - This game was made in 10 days for QR Desktop Jam by Gurgie. Game is about mysterious character Qr Code Master who wants to explore unknown dungeons and kill monsters.

To play the game you need special app for android phone, QR CODE GAME CONTROLLER

Main Designer, Graphic Artist, Programmer - Dawid Blumczyński

Programmer - Max Gacek

App Developer - Szymon Blumczyński
